text: K45IE-D is a low-power television station in Vail, Colorado, broadcasting locally in digital on UHF channel 45 as an affiliate of Outside Television. Founded September 17, 1992, the station is owned by Vail Resorts. The station brands itself as TV8, and its signal can be seen throughout the Vail area on cable channel 8. TV8 Summit covering Breckenridge Resort, Keystone Resort, and the greater Summit County. ==See also== *K36DB-CD == External links == *TV8 & 17 official site *TV8 & 17 official site * 45IE-D Category:Television channels and stations established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in Colorado Category:Digital low-power television stations
title: K45IE-D
